long_description: Wherever your weekend adventures take you-this Sunday Afternoons Adventure hat will provide your head with full coverage against the elements. Oversized crown with large mesh side panels permit a cooling breeze to flow through; internal CoolMax(R) sweatband controls moisture. Durable, water-resistant, Supplex(R) nylon with a UPF 50 rating withstands the harmful effects of the sun's UV rays. Sizing strap in back cinches the hat in place for a personalized fit. Wide 4 in. brim in front shades the entire face; even wider 7.5 in. Supplex cape in back protects your neck and ears. Foam-filled brim keeps the hat afloat if it should blow overboard; dark color under the brim absorbs reflective light, reducing glare. Chin strap with cordlock keeps the hat connected when a stiff wind blows. Decorative webbing band across the brow provides a splash of color. Adventure Hat weighs only 3 oz.!
